ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] More women playing EQ lately?
ygData.msgSnippet: My main is a male character. I have talked to men who have their daughters play as males so as not to be harassed by other players. Heh. I ve had guys who know
ygData.messageBody:
My main is a male character. I have talked to men who have their daughters
play as males so as not to be harassed by other players.
Heh. I've had guys who know I'm female hug and flirt with me to the raised
eyebrows of others.
It's pretty amusing. People really get confused when they don't know I'm
female and don't know that the person I'm calling "sweetheart" is my little
brother.
I have male characters on other servers but haven't played them much.
luv,
-Su

> Ok, so how many male chars are played by women???
>
> This would be funny. Knowing a male char is Female in
> person and saying out of context.
>
> "Hey Regal, you are looking good sweetie?"
> NOTE: this should be said in a crowded place like the
> EC tunnel........
>
> Boy would that draw attention...... lol
>
> ENJOY!
>
>
> --- Louis Gumaer <lgumaer@...> wrote:
> > I read somewhere that approximately 1/6 of players
> > are really women. There are probabaly a lot of male
> > characters played by women. I think this will change
> > over time as videogames become a more popular form
> > of entertainment.
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: nara MKs
> > To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> > Sent: Thursday, May 02, 2002 9:26 AM
> > Subject: Re: [EverQuest] More women playing EQ
> > lately?
> >
> >
> > Not sure how true this is but it would be exciting
> > to
> > know that it is true. Have been playing another
> > game
> > (my bad) where i would have to say the majority of
> > female characters ARE played by men...
> >
> > Amaiya (no surname picked yet,who REALLY IS a
> > girl)
> > Lvl 20 Druid, Fenin Ro
> >
> > --- "J. Smythe" <lgumaer@...> wrote:
> > > I just noticed recently that I seem to be
> > running
> > > into more women while running around Norrath. I
> > mean
> > > characters played by women, is there any truth
> > to
> > > this, or did I just not care in the past and
> > didn't
> > > notice? That would be really cool if it were
> > true.
> > >
> > >
> > >
